channel.title: Is it possible to make monsters drop items?
channel.description: OK, I will make anybody that can make my monsters drop items an admin on my server with max stats. First of all, I've tried all the tutprials on making monsters drop items ive seen and they all say use item2.java or item3.java. I am using P16 v.4.5 source and it DOESNT have an item2.java or item3.java. I tried adding it to item.java but i got errors. Ive tried using Npcdrops.cfg but that doesn't work either. Wich has forced me to come to the conclusion that it is impossible to make a monster on a p16 source drop items.

item.title: Is it possible to make monsters drop items?
item.dc:creator: @Ninja Ninja
item.description:
@Ninja wrote:

mrrules:

Have u tryed the npc handler?

So its possible to make monsters drop items with Npc handler? If so, please tell how.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to make monsters drop items?
